patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -3,11 +3,12 @@
   content: [
     "./pages/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
     "./components/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
     "./app/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
-    "./src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}", // if using src structure
+    "./src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}", // include if using src folder structure
   ],
   theme: {
     extend: {},
   },
   plugins: [],
+  darkMode: "class", // optional: for dark mode toggle
 };

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -3,12 +3,12 @@
   content: [
     "./pages/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
     "./components/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
     "./app/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
-    "./src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}", // include if using src folder structure
+    "./src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
   ],
   theme: {
     extend: {},
   },
   plugins: [],
-  darkMode: "class", // optional: for dark mode toggle
+  darkMode: "class", // enable class-based dark mode toggle
 };

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,14 +0,0 @@
-/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
-module.exports = {
-  content: [
-    "./pages/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
-    "./components/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
-    "./app/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
-    "./src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
-  ],
-  theme: {
-    extend: {},
-  },
-  plugins: [],
-  darkMode: "class",
-};
\ No newline at end of file
